thread.section_title: Dragonimage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dragonimage | dragonimage.com.au
thread.title: Phil Young

author: Phil Young
title: Phil Young
text: An item I ordered from Dragonimage was delivered promptly by FastWay couriers. However, I have 2 problems regards the courier service. Firstly, $25 for a courier to deliver a small 2kg parcel from Artarmon to an inner-city address is excessive. Either Dragonimage are making a considerable profit on this item, or FastWay couriers are. The courier arrived and handed it to me at my doorway but didn't bother to either ask my name or ask for a signature, so there was no proof of delivery.
